title: kAraNam vinA
sahitya:
kAraNam vinA kAryam nOtpadyatE kimapi kanjanAbha niyatam


anupallavi

  nIrada nIlam manOhara tara mUrtE dhAritA shrtajana dAruNa vividhArtE


caraNam 1    janana kAraNam karama jnAna kAraNam vidyA dhanamATOPa kAraNam taruNI mOha kAraNam anayOhAni kAraNam AdhI shOka kAraNam ghana samrddhi kAraNam nanu dharmao jagadIsha
     caraNam 2    taru kAraNam bIjam dhairyam jaya kAraNam parama dainya kAraNam bhavati hIna yAcanA 
karuNA kAraNam sAdhu carita shAlitA lOkE taraLatA nikhilApadAmiha kAraNam
    caraNam 3   shamatamAdi kAraNam sAdhu shAstra niSEvA samasa syApta kAraNam saravrSTi rEvAhO 
timirA bhAva kAraNam dinamaNi ramAkAnta mama sharmaika kAraNam kamalAkSa tava pAdau
